page.title: 16GLADYS DAVIES - WRITER.
page.content:
MRS GLADYS DAVIES LIVES AT BROOK COTTAGE IN THE HAMLET OF CANDY SOME TWO MILES FROM THE MARKET TOWN OF OSWESTRY.
MRS DAVIES WAS BORN IN LIVERPOOL AND HAS LIVED IN CANDY FOR ABOUT 20 YEARS.
THE GREATEST CHANGE IN THE COMMUNITY THAT MRS DAVIES HAS NOTICED OVER THE YEARS IS THAT THERE ARE NOW LESS FAMILIES LIVING IN THE AREA WHO HAVE LOCAL ROOTS. THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE LIVING IN THE HAMLET WHO HAVE MOVED FROM OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTY AND COUNTRY.
MRS DAVIES WRITES CHILDREN'S STORIES FOR RADIO AND ALSO WRITES ARTICLES FOR MAGAZINES SUCH AS{SHROPSHIRE}MAGAZINE.
